sentences.english: Entire malls will become ghost towns.
sentences.chinese: 所有的大型商场都将变得门可罗雀。

sentences.english: These are usually associated with a major publisher and a strong brand.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过与一个大型的发行商和很强的品牌相关联。

sentences.english: Large scaled geosciences software systems often use several dozens of types of data.
sentences.chinese: 大型的地质行业软件系统使用到多达几十种数据类型。

sentences.english: Try to avoid sending large records to the front end to be transformed there.
sentences.chinese: 尽量避免发送大型记录到前端并在那里转换。

sentences.chinese: 岛的一端是一个大型鸟园。

sentences.english: The results supported the potential for using triage-based PDA systems at mass gatherings .
sentences.chinese: 评估结果显示本系统在支援大型活动的潜在价值。

sentences.english: Add a loop or make a schedule to generate large data volumes.
sentences.chinese: 添加一个循环或者做一个安排以生成大型的数据集。

sentences.english: If necessary, get a separate survey of the engine of a larger sailboat.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，对大型帆船的引擎进行单独的检验。

sentences.english: These voracious scavengers work together to strip the carcasses of large animals.

sentences.english: This process are also suitable for the deeply hardening of large-scale plate-type wor…
